name: 30-hydroxy-11-oxo-beta-amyrin,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (30-hydroxylating)
definition: 30-Hydroxy-11-oxo-beta-amyrin + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> Glycyrrhetaldehyde + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
comment: the second step of three-step reaction (see R10316, R10313+R10314+R10315)
